duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide world-class customer service, maintain store presentation, and handle cash and key controls as assigned by the supervisor.
Operate the cash register and prepare status reports, maintain inventory and stock levels, and restock shelves.
Ensure product merchandising standards, pricing, signage, and coding on the sales floor, and answer incoming phone calls.
Maintain a clean and neat work area, including parking lots, carts, and trash areas to exceed all cleanliness standards.
Handle tasks such as lifting, pushing/pulling up to 50lbs, standing, stooping for prolonged periods, climbing, performing repetitive motions, and working in a loud and hot environment.
